Title: Relates to affordable housing for persons with a disability or having attained the age of sixty-two
Summary: Relates to affordable housing for persons with a disability or having attained the age of sixty-two; establishes a developmentally disabled and elderly adult accessory apartment loan program.
LawCode: Amd ยง45-b, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to affordable housing for persons with disabilities and those having attained the age of sixty-two
